Introducing the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - the perfect addition to your home, dorm, office, or kitchen. Experience the innovation and superior performance of this artistic home appliance brand, designed to meet the needs of customers worldwide.

With intuitive control, easily adjust the heat settings using the control knob on the right side. Choose from "I" for gentle warmth at 750 watts, "II" for faster and hotter heat at 1500 watts, or switch to "Fan" for cool air circulation. Fine-tune the temperature to your exact preference with the thermostat knob on the left, ensuring optimal comfort with precision.

Safety is our top priority, which is why the KISSAIR Space Heater comes with enhanced safety features. Experience peace of mind with built-in overheat protection and tip-over protection. The thermostat control automatically shuts off the heater when it reaches a preset temperature, reactivating once the temperature drops. By efficiently heating specific areas instead of the entire house, you can save on electricity bills. Whether it's in your bedroom, living room, study, or office, enjoy the convenience of its portability.

Experience the benefits of advanced ceramic technology with the Easy Control Heater. It employs a PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) heating element, offering superior stability compared to traditional heating elements. Benefit from rapid heat generation, dependable performance, and optimum safety. Its low thermal resistance ensures swift heat exchange without any visible redness on the heater's surface, reducing the risk of burns, fire hazards, and other safety concerns. Operating at noise levels below 45 dB, this ceramic heater provides a whisper-quiet environment. You can use it in your bedroom while sleeping without any disturbance. Enjoy a peaceful and comfortable ambiance, and relish in the cozy warmth it brings.
